  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3465</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3465</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La veu</string>
            <string language="en">The voice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Stimme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La voix</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A voz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La voce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η φωνή</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva  sobre l'audició i el reconeixement dels diferents registres de la veu humana i l'àmbit de cada tessitura. Conté activitats d'identificació dels diferents registres (Avalua't) i la identificació de la tessitura pròpia (Practica). També conté un petit glossari.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit on listening to and recognizing the different registers of the human voice and the range of each tessitura (pitch range). It includes identification activities for the different registers and the identification of the tessitura itself, as well as a short glossary.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escoltar música</string>
            <string language="en">listening to music</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escola de música</string>
            <string language="en">music school</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">cant</string>
            <string language="en">singing</string>
            <string language="es">canto</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit auf 
dem Hören zu und dem Erkennen der unterschiedlichen Register der 
menschlichen Stimme und der Strecke jedes tessitura (Nickbereich). 
Er schließt Kennzeichenaktivitäten für die unterschiedlichen 
Register und das Kennzeichen des tessitura selbst, sowie ein kurzes 
Glossar ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive sur 
écouter et identifier les différents registres de la voix humaine et
l'intervalle de chaque tessitura (intervalle de lancement). Il 
inclut des activités d'identification pour les différents registres 
et l'identification du tessitura lui-même, aussi bien qu'un glossaire
court.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa em escutar e em
reconhecer os registos diferentes da voz humana e a escala de cada 
tessitura (escala de passo). Inclui atividades da 
identificação para os registos diferentes e a identificação do 
tessitura próprios, as.well.as um glossário curto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva sul 
ascoltare e sul riconoscere i registri differenti della voce umana e 
la gamma di ogni tessitura (gamma di passo). Include le 
attività dell'identificazione per i registri differenti e 
l'identificazione del tessitura in se, così come un glossario corto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας στο άκουσμα και την
αναγνώριση των διαφορετικών καταλόγων της ανθρώπινης φωνής και 
της σειράς κάθε tessitura (σειρά πισσών). Περιλαμβάνει 
τις δραστηριότητες προσδιορισμού για τους διαφορετικούς καταλόγους
και τον προσδιορισμό το ίδιο του tessitura, καθώς επίσης και 
ένα συνοπτικό γλωσσάρι.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hören Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikschule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Singen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écouter la musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">école de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escutar a música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escola da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cantar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ascoltando la musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scuola di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">canto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άκουσμα τη μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχολείο μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τραγούδι</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
